title: List of all Androidprocessing   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidprocessing   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: processing-android
repoList.description: Processing mode and core library to create Android apps with Processing

repoList.name: Dexter
repoList.description: Android library that simplifies the process of requesting permissions at runtime.

repoList.name: AndroidLibyuvImageUtils
repoList.description: A image processing library on Android, base on the libyuv.

repoList.name: android_permission_aspectjx
repoList.description: A AOP library that process Android M permissions with aspectjx.

repoList.name: BoofCV
repoList.description: Fast computer vision library for SFM, calibration, fiducials, tracking,  image processing, and more.

repoList.name: fresco-processors
repoList.description: An Android image processor library providing a variety of image transformations for Fresco.

repoList.name: processing-android-serial
repoList.description: Android Serial Library for Processing

repoList.name: BtSerial
repoList.description: A Bluetooth Serial library for Processing for Android

repoList.name: android_ProcessBar
repoList.description: An android process bar library associated with ViewPager through single method

repoList.name: EasyBle
repoList.description: Multi-devices process Bluetooth library for Android
